<!-- ## New investigators -->

```{r db-people-table}
new_people <- databraryapi::get_db_stats(type = "people")
new_people %>%
  mutate(db_url = paste0("https://databrary.org/party/", id)) %>%
  select(., sortname, prename, affiliation, db_url) %>%
  unite(col = "Full Name", prename, sortname, sep=" ") %>%
  knitr::kable(col.names = c("Full Name", "Affiliation", "Databrary URL")) %>%
  kable_styling() #%>%
  #save_kable(file = "new_institutions.html", self_contained = T)
```
